tallyPieces() - Method in class ru.bit.torrent.FileAccess
Called upon resuming a torrent download.
theirPieces - Variable in class ru.gui.PeerInfoPanel
 
ToolKit - Class in ru.bit.torrent
Contains a number of methods useful for debugging and developing programs using Bencoding methods.  This class is specifically designed to be used with edu.rutgers.cs.cs352.bt.util.Bencoder and Bencoder2.
ToolKit() - Constructor for class ru.bit.torrent.ToolKit
 
torrent_file_bytes - Variable in class ru.bit.torrent.TorrentInfo
A byte array containing the raw bytes of the torrent metainfo file.
torrent_file_map - Variable in class ru.bit.torrent.TorrentInfo
The base dictionary of the torrent metainfo file.  See http://www.bittorrent.org/beps/bep_0003.html for an explanation of what keys are available and how they map.
torrentInfo - Variable in class ru.bit.torrent.FileAccess
 
torrentInfo - Variable in class ru.bit.torrent.Manager
The TorrentInfo object corresponding the torrent specified in the command line.

The TorrentInfo object corresponding the torrent specified in the command line.
torrentInfo - Variable in class ru.bit.torrent.SocketListener
 
TorrentInfo - Class in ru.bit.torrent
This is a data structure class that extracts basic information from a bencoded torrent metainfo file and stores it in public fields.  Note that this class only works for torrent metainfo files for a single-file torrent.
TorrentInfo(byte[]) - Constructor for class ru.bit.torrent.TorrentInfo
Creates a new TorrentInfo object from the specified byte array.
torrentInfo - Variable in class ru.bit.torrent.Tracker
The TorrentInfo object containing all necessary data to connect to the tracker.
torrentPath - Variable in class ru.bit.torrent.RUBTClient
The path of the .torrent file.

trackerThread - Variable in class ru.bit.torrent.Manager
A Thread object corresponding to the Tracker class This must be on its own separate Thread, as it sleeps for the min interval specified by the tracker.
trackerURL - Variable in class ru.bit.torrent.Tracker
The URL of the tracker with given queries.
